title: My Birth
description: I was born on the 3rd of December, 2002, in the culturally rich district of Kannur, Kerala.Here is the beginning of my journey.

title: SSLC
description: I successfully completed my SSLC in March 2019 from Mambaram Higher Secondary School, achieving an outstanding percentage of 97%.

title: Plus Two
description: Completed Plus Two in Computer Science from Mambaram Higher Secondary School with 81%.

title: Diploma in Electronics Engineering
description: Earned my Diploma from Government Polytechnic College with a CGPA of 8.04.

title: Full-Stack Development Journey
description: Started learning MERN stack with HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript as the base.

title: Node.js Mastery
description: Mastering backend development using Node.js and Express.

title: MongoDB Exploration
description: Started building projects with MongoDB for Database Management.

title: First Project
description: Completed my first project, a custom e-commerce site.
